template.name: ModuleQueue
template.parameter: const mid_safe_t mid, const int length, const bool worktype[NUMBER_OF_WORKTYPES], const int p_time[NUMBER_OF_WORKTYPES], const int cost_rate[NUMBER_OF_WORKTYPES]

template.name: ModuleTransporter
template.parameter: const mid_safe_t mid, const int t_time[NUMBER_OF_OUTPUTS][NUMBER_OF_OUTPUTS], const mid_t next[NUMBER_OF_OUTPUTS], bool pass_through

template.name: ModuleWorker
template.parameter: const mid_safe_t mid, const bool worktype[NUMBER_OF_WORKTYPES], const int p_time[NUMBER_OF_WORKTYPES], const int cost_rate[NUMBER_OF_WORKTYPES]

transition.label: e: wid_t
worktype[e] && unworked[e]
index = e, local_c = 0, remaining -= p_time[e] * cost_rate[e]

template.name: Recipe
template.parameter: rid_safe_t rid, mid_t mid_start, wid_t& n_work[N_OF_NOD1], int& n_num_parents[N_OF_NOD1], int& n_children[N_OF_NOD1][N_OF_NOD1], int& n_children_len[N_OF_NOD1], const int length, did_safe_t origin

template.name: RecipeQueue
